flawed_nl_solution:
He makes 20*40=${<<20*40=800>>}800 per week
He used to make 16*25=${<<16*25=400>>}400 per week
So his raise was 800-400=${<<800-400=40>>}40 per week
So he makes 40*52=${<<40*52=2080>>}2080 per year more

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 40. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
